DEI FMD status register configuration. More...

Detailed Description

DEI FMD status register configuration.

struct Vps_DeiFmdStatusReg

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdStatusReg::caf

Detected combing artifacts. Read only parameter.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdStatusReg::chNum

Channel number for which the configuration is to be set/get. Used only in M2M driver, for display and capture driver set this to 0.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdStatusReg::fldDiff

Field difference (difference between two neighboring fields, one top and one bottom). Read only parameter.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdStatusReg::fldMode

Field mode used in MDT (not part of FMD register but it is needed for FMD SW.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdStatusReg::frameDiff

Frame difference (difference between two top or two bottom fields). Read only parameter.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdStatusReg::reset

When 1, the film mode detection module needs to be reset by the software. This bit needs to be checked at each occurrence of the film mode detection interrupt. Read only parameter.
